mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.menu_name AS "menuName", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.href AS "href", a.view_perm_url AS "viewPermUrl", a.edit_perm_url AS "editPermUrl"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gen_menu( menu_name, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, href, view_perm_url, edit_perm_url ) VALUES ( #{menuName}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{href}, #{viewPermUrl}, #{editPermUrl} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gen_menu SET menu_name = #{menuName}, remarks = #{remarks}, href = #{href}, view_perm_url = #{viewPermUrl}, edit_perm_url = #{editPermUrl} WHERE id = #{id}
